name: Uhh uh umm uh (in progess)
description:
Could not finish in time. Barely started working on actual gameplay.  :')

The idea of the game was: it's 1v1, you have two guns, one just kills the other player and you get 10 points, the other one (way less accurate and harder to kill with) erases the other player's points, similar to sticks and stones from BO2. Whoever has the most points (highest combo) when the clock runs out, wins. 

I will definitely keep working on the game and hopefully be submitting it for the Arcade cabinet.

I did all the programming, and my girlfriend's 14 year old brother, Anthony, drew all the characters.
